thread.title: Iain
thread.title_full: Espai Barcelona apartments evaluado por Iain

author: Iain
title: Iain
text: 2 bedroom flat in residential area, a few steps from supermarkets, 10 mins walk from Placa Espana shops and restaurants. Hostafrancs and Tarragona metro 2 or 5 mins away. Clean and modern, Euro-satellite TV, washing m/c, fridge freezer full electric cooker plus microwave. Excellent base for work, study or sight-seeing.
